Package sensors

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    LineReaderListener
    LineReaderListener is the interface that contains the method signiture that defines what happens when the LineReader detects a line
    UltrasonicListener
    these are the interface for classes that listens to the ultrasonic poller it contains a method ultrasonicDistance(int distance); which obtains the distance measured by the ultrasonic poller and make actions accordinly.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ColorPoller
    Intended to control the color polling and determine what kind of color is being detected from custom calibration done
    LineReader
    this is used to read line from the grund with the colorReader
    UltrasonicPoller
    ultrasonicPoller will poll the ultrasonic sensor periodically and call which ever UltrasonicListener that should run when reaching certain distance.
